title: SubjectivePlayer Config
description: Configuration file for SubjectivePlayer video quality assessment tests

method.description: Rating method to use. ACR: 5-point scale, CONTINUOUS: 0-100 slider, TIME_CONTINUOUS: real-time volume button rating

custom_messages.description: Custom messages to display during the test

start_message.description: Message shown before the first video

finish_message.description: Message shown after the last video

pre_questionnaire_message.description: Introductory message shown before the pre-questionnaire

post_questionnaire_message.description: Introductory message shown before the post-questionnaire

playlist.description: List of video filenames and special commands

pre_questionnaire.description: Questionnaire to show before the test (not yet implemented in UI)

post_questionnaire.description: Questionnaire to show after the test (not yet implemented in UI)

type.description: Type of input: number (numeric), radio (single choice), multiple-choice (multiple selection), text (free text)

options.description: Options for radio or multiple-choice questions

required.description: Whether an answer is required (default: true)
